messages.subject: Question for unschooling bloggers
messages.msgSnippet: Would you be interested in participating in the unschooling blog carnival if it was started up again? Ron & Andrea (atypicalhomeschool.net) used to run it but
messages.messageBody:
Would you be interested in participating in the unschooling blog
carnival if it was started up again? Ron & Andrea
(atypicalhomeschool.net) used to run it but had to stop and I've
been thinking about trying to get it started again.

For those of you that don't know what it is...a blog carnival is a
bunch of related blog posts on one topic, such as unschooling. It's
a great way to find new blogs, read some great posts and let other
people know about your blog. Not to mention, it kinda build a nice
unschooling community feel among the bloggers. :-)

For now it would be held once a month (a lot of carnivals are held
every week but we can build up to that).

All you would do is submit one of your posts on unschooling to me
every month and I'll put the whole thing together.

Can you please reply at this link if you're interested.

http://tinyurl.com/lnp4l

I'd like to keep the replies in one place so I know how many people
are interested without having to remember all the places I'm going
to post this. LOL

Also, can you please ask on your blog? If you could direct your
visitors to the above link so they can reply, it would be a big
help.

Thanks so much!

~ Joanne ~
Mom to Jacqueline (7), Shawna (11) & Cimion (13)
Adopted into our hearts October 30, 2003
http://anunschoolinglife.blogspot.com/
http://foreverparents.com
